The Black Hole sells surplus equipment acquired from the Los Alamos National Laboratories.
They sell everything from 1950â€™s era oscilloscopes to liquid nitrogen dewars, from dials, knobs & calculators to A-bomb detonator cables. It is a museum of nuclear research where everything is for sale.
Update March, 2017: This business is no longer in operation.
column6: Seller of surplus nuclear research materials.
